history.proof: intros Q H1 p H2. induction H2. apply ReduStarConfluent0. intros r s H3 H4. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : SpolyQ Q p : list (Term A n) H : olist (A:=A) ltM p H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p r, s : list (Term A n) H3 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r H4 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p s Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ltM p" with "eqP A eqA n r s".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : SpolyQ Q p : list (Term A n) H : olist (A:=A) ltM p H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p r, s : list (Term A n) H3 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r H4 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p s Unable to unify "SpolyQ Q" with "eqP A eqA n r s".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : SpolyQ Q p : list (Term A n) H : olist (A:=A) ltM p H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p r, s : list (Term A n) H3 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r H4 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p s Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ltM p" with "eqP A eqA n r s".

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : SpolyQ Q p : list (Term A n) H : olist (A:=A) ltM p H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p r, s : list (Term A n) H3 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r H4 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p s Unable to unify "nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p" with "eqP A eqA n r s".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), SpolyQ Q -> forall p : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ReduStarConfluent Q p

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive SpolyQ (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) : Prop := SpolyQ0 : (forall p q : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> Spoly_1 Q p q) -> SpolyQ Q Arguments SpolyQ _%list_scope Arguments SpolyQ0 _%list_scope _%function_scope
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
poly : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Type
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
Inductive ReduStarConfluent (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : list (Term A n)) : Prop := ReduStarConfluent0 : (forall r s : list (Term A n), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p r -> reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p s -> eqP A eqA n r s) -> ReduStarConfluent Q p Arguments ReduStarConfluent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments ReduStarConfluent0 (_ _)%list_scope _%function_scope
Reducef : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : poly A0 eqA ltM), {q : poly A0 eqA ltM | reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM q)}
reduce_in_pO : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (pO A n)

reducestar_in_pO : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (pO A n)

```  
intros Q H1 p H2.
induction H2.
- apply ReduStarConfluent0.
  intros r s H3 H4.
  apply eqP_refl.
- apply eqP_symm in H.
  apply eqP_trans with (y:=u).
  + apply IHcanonical2.
    * apply eqP_symm. apply eqP_symm in H. apply H.
    * apply H1.
  + apply IHcanonical3.
    * apply eqP_symm in H. apply H.
    * apply H0.
```

original: intros Q H1 p H2. induction H2. - apply ReduStarConfluent0. intros r s H3 H4. apply eqP_refl. - apply eqP_symm in H. apply eqP_trans with (y:=u). + apply IHcanonical2. * apply eqP_symm. apply eqP_symm in H. apply H. * apply H1. + apply IHcanonical3. * apply eqP_symm in H. apply H. * apply H0.
